data.comment: Today's referee, Benjamin Cortus, has blown to start the match.
Benjamin Cortus signals a Hertha throw-in in B. Munich's half.
In the minute 1, Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
B. Munich's Alphonso Davies has run offside.
In the minute 3, Hertha are caught offside.
Ball goes out of play for a B. Munich goal kick.
Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Hertha.
In the minute 6, B. Munich to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 9, Robert Lewandowski of B. Munich smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In Munich B. Munich drive forward through Robert Lewandowski. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 9, Hertha are pushing forward but Dodi Lukebakio's finish is wide of the goal.
Benjamin Cortus awards B. Munich a goal kick.
Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hertha drive upfield and Jhon Cordoba gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a B. Munich defender.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 13, Jhon Cordoba (Hertha) has received a yellow card from Benjamin Cortus.
Benjamin Cortus blows against Hertha's Jhon Cordoba for offside.
Benjamin Cortus signals a throw-in for B. Munich, close to Hertha's area.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Hertha.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
B. Munich are coming forward and Leon Goretzka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Hertha at Allianz Arena.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
B. Munich drives forward and Serge Gnabry gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 21, Benjamin Cortus awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in B. Munich.
Throw-in for Hertha at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Hertha.
In Munich B. Munich attack through Serge Gnabry. The finish is off target, however.
Hertha have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Can Hertha capitalize from this throw-in deep inside B. Munich's half?
Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Hertha.
Benjamin Cortus awards Hertha a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Hertha to take a throw-in in B. Munich territory.
B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, In Munich a free kick has been awarded the away team.
B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Hertha.
In the minute 33, Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to B. Munich.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
Thomas Muller of B. Munich is pulled up for offside.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 40, B. Munich pushes forward through Robert Lewandowski, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Robert Lewandowski.
Serge Gnabry instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Allianz Arena, Hertha are penalized for being offside.
Important block from the Hertha defence as Robert Lewandowski fires in a strike for B. Munich.
In the minute 45, Benjamin Cortus signals a B. Munich throw-in in Hertha's half.
B. Munich's Robert Lewandowski gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hertha defender.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 47, B. Munich have a dangerous throw-in.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
B. Munich's Robert Lewandowski attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Hertha goal kick.
Throw-in Hertha.
Throw-in for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 49, In Munich a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Thomas Muller of B. Munich gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hertha have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hertha drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Robert Lewandowski puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Chris Richards.
Benjamin Cortus awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, B. Munich to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
Free kick B. Munich.
Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Hertha.
In the minute 56, Benjamin Cortus awards Hertha a goal kick.
In Munich, Hertha push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 58, Benjamin Cortus signals a Hertha throw-in in B. Munich's half.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Hertha.
B. Munich's Lucas Hernandez has been booked in Munich.
Jhon Cordoba (Hertha) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 59, Great play from Matheus Cunha to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Chris Richards.
In the minute 63, Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Hertha.
Serge Gnabry (B. Munich) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Chris Richards has recovered and rejoins the match in Munich.
In the minute 65, Hans-Dieter Flick (B. Munich) has taken off Chris Richards who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Benjamin Pavard is the replacement.
Jamal Musiala is replacing Lucas Hernandez for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
Hans-Dieter Flick (B. Munich) is making a first substitution, with Corentin Tolisso replacing Joshua Kimmich.
In the minute 67, Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hertha push upfield but Benjamin Cortus quickly pulls them for offside.
Bruno Labbadia is making the team's first substitution at Allianz Arena with Krzysztof Piatek replacing Deyovaisio Zeefuik.
In the minute 69, Ball safe as B. Munich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Hertha in the half of B. Munich.
Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
In the minute 71, Matheus Cunha grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at Allianz Arena.
Krzysztof Piatek instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in high up the field for B. Munich in Munich.
In the minute 75, Free kick B. Munich.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Hertha at Allianz Arena.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a B. Munich goal kick.
In the minute 79, B. Munich are in shooting range from this free kick.
David Alaba (B. Munich) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 80, Corentin Tolisso's header is off-target for B. Munich.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
Benjamin Cortus awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to B. Munich.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Hertha.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 83, B. Munich are pushing forward but Serge Gnabry's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Hertha at Allianz Arena.
In Munich a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 84, At Allianz Arena, Krzysztof Piatek has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Serge Gnabry (B. Munich) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Robert Lewandowski gives B. Munich a 3-2 lead.
In the minute 85, Serge Gnabry with an assist there.
Benjamin Cortus signals a Hertha throw-in in B. Munich's half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Munich to check on Alphonso Davies, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 88, The away team replace Dodi Lukebakio with Jessic Ngankam.
Jessic Ngankam scores with his head for Hertha to level the match at 3-3.
That's a fine assist from Maximilian Mittelstadt.
Hertha have a goal kick.
Throw-in B. Munich.
B. Munich have been given a penalty...
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Munich.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benjamin Cortus blows to end the match. The final score is 4-3.
It seems as if Alphonso Davies is unable to continue. Niklas Sule replaces him for the home team.
Maximilian Mittelstadt (Hertha) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Robert Lewandowski gives B. Munich the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 4-3.
Robert Lewandowski for B. Munich has been booked by Benjamin Cortus and receives a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Serge Gnabry with Javi Martinez. This is the fifth substitution made today by Hans-Dieter Flick.
